scripts.build:dev: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "gulp build-core && gulp phenome && gulp build-vue && gulp build-react"
scripts.build:prod: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "gulp build-core && gulp phenome && gulp build-vue && gulp build-react"
scripts.build-vue:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development gulp phenome && gulp build-vue
scripts.build-vue:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp phenome && gulp build-vue
scripts.build-react:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development gulp phenome && gulp build-react
scripts.build-react:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp phenome && gulp build-react
scripts.dev: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "gulp build-core && gulp phenome && gulp build-vue && gulp build-react && gulp ks-core && gulp ks-react && gulp ks-vue && gulp server"
scripts.prod: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "gulp ks-core && gulp ks-react && gulp ks-vue && gulp server"
scripts.core:dev: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "gulp build-core && gulp ks-core && gulp server-core"
scripts.react:dev: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "gulp build-core && gulp phenome && gulp build-react && gulp ks-react && gulp server-react"
scripts.vue:dev: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development "gulp build-core && gulp phenome && gulp build-vue && gulp ks-vue && gulp server-vue"
scripts.postinstall: node -e "console.log('\u001b[35m\u001b[1mLove Framework7? Support project by donating or pledging on patreon:\u001b[22m\u001b[39m\n > \u001b[32mhttps://patreon.com/vladimirkharlampidi\u001b[0m\n')"
